mapper.select: SELECT inventory_no, i.inventory_type, CASE WHEN i.inventory_type = '완제품' then p.product_name WHEN i.inventory_type = '자재' then m.mtr_name ELSE NULL END AS item_name, w.warehouse_name AS warehouse_id, i.inventory_qty, i.inventory_count, i.mod_date, i.mod_user, i.zone, c.common_detail_name AS unit FROM inventory i LEFT JOIN product p ON i.inventory_type = '완제품' AND i.item_no = p.product_no LEFT JOIN material m ON i.inventory_type = '자재' AND i.item_no = m.mtr_no LEFT JOIN warehouse w ON i.warehouse_id = w.warehouse_id LEFT JOIN common_detail c ON (CASE WHEN i.inventory_type = '완제품' THEN p.product_unit WHEN i.inventory_type = '자재' THEN m.mtr_unit END) = c.common_detail_code
